Package com.lpoo.bombic.Screens

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractScreen
    Creates an abstract screen used to implement the other
    ChooseLevelScreen
    Screen used to select the level to play in the story mode
    CreditsScreen
    Screen that displays credits information
    DeathmatchIntermidiateScreen
    Screen displayed in between deathmatch levels
    DeathmatchScreen
    Screen used to choose deathmatch options
    HelpScreen
    Screen that displays an image with controls information
    IntermidiateLevelsScreen
    Screen in between story mode levels
    MenuScreen
    Screen that represents the main menu
    MonstersInfoScreen
    Screen used to display mosnters info
    PlayScreen
    Screen used to display the game
    SettingsScreen
    Screen that displays the settings options
    StoryModeScreen
    Screen used to choose story mode options
